long_description: The Fischer XC Touring boots are built with comfort and performance in mind, making them ideal for a day spent cruising the groomed tracks. Twin Skin concept features inner boot liners for a secure fit and outer boots for protection against cold and wet. Extremely durable, non-bulky Thinsulate(TM) insulation offers excellent warmth and is water and pressure resistant. NNN soles with a medium hardness provide you with power transfer, optimum flex and straightforward flex for walking. Zippered neoprene lace covers keep laces snow-free. Fischer XC Touring boots feature high cuffs for sealing out cold and snow.
short_description: The Fischer XC Touring boots are built with comfort and performance in mind, making them ideal for a day spent cruising the groomed tracks.
